hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

locations.Bottom of the Well Underwater Front Ches: Small Key Ring (Bottom of the Well)

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #the Fire Arrows#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #Arrows (10 pieces)# and #the Biggoron Sword#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that racing #Dampé's ghost# rewards...^ #Arrows (5 pieces)# and #a Purple Rupee#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #the Shadow Temple# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Blue Rupee#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Deku Nuts (10 pieces)#.
